result.purpose: Responsible for the initialization, configuration, and routing of the Antenna application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for managing application components.

cmd/antenna/config.go.purpose: Defines configuration structures for the antenna service in the application.

cmd/antenna/main.go.purpose: Initializes and starts the Antenna application with configuration and logging.

cmd/antenna/routes.go.purpose: Defines route handlers for private and public groups in an antenna service.

cmd/antenna/wire.go.purpose: This file sets up dependency injection for the antenna application using Google Wire.

cmd/antenna/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code for the antenna application using Wire.
